Crown closes case in Tauranga murder trial, claims Mongrel Mob’s deadly attack was retribution https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crown-closes-case-in-tauranga-murder-Trial-claims-mongrel-mobs-deadly-attack-was-retribution/BIXH6FQJHNDXLIRCTZJK7HMYIM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crown-closes-case-in-tauranga-murder-Trial-claims-mongrel-mobs-deadly-attack-was-retribution/BIXH6FQJHNDXLIRCTZJK7HMYIM/ Belinda FeekThe Crown has closed its case in the lengthy murder trial of nine Mongrel Mob members.
